items.title: Can Nifty reclaim 25,000 again? Key levels to watch on May 28
items.description: Markets rode a rollercoaster on May 27, with the Sensex swinging nearly 1,300 points in a dramatic session that saw bulls and bears battle for control. Heavy selling in auto and IT dragged the Nifty and Sensex off their two-day winning streak.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: ITC, HBL Engineering, Belrise, LIC, MedPlus Health, Bosch, Hindustan Copper, Bharat Dynamics, Gateway Distriparks in focus on 28 May
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 28 May: Stocks like ITC, HBL Engineering, Belrise Industries, LIC, MedPlus Health Services, Bosch, Hindustan Copper, Bharat Dynamics, and Gateway Distriparks will be in focus on May 28.

items.title: Asian shares track Wall Street gains, bonds steady
items.description: A regional stock gauge rose 0.4% led by shares in Japan, which jumped more than 1%.

items.title: Hindalco: Should one look at this stock, post a strong Q4?
items.description: Downstream aluminium demand continues to be strong and the company is focusing on capacity expansion

items.title: Buy Schneider Electric Infrastructure; target of Rs 810: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on Schneider Electric Infrastructure has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 810 in its research report dated May 28, 2025.

items.title: LIC shares in focus on mixed Q4: Should you buy, sell, or hold?
items.description: LIC’s March quarter (Q4FY25) results revealed a 38 percent rise in profit, but a dip in premium income left analysts split

items.title: Defence stocks soar up to 10% amid muted market, index extends gains for sixth session; what lies ahead?
items.description: Unimech Aerospace and Manufacturing was the top gainer on the index, surging 10% to remain locked in the upper circuit at Rs 1,179.50 apiece

items.title: Gainers & Losers: 10 stocks that moved the most on May 28
items.description: About 1,962 shares advanced, 1,831 shares declined, and 151 shares remained unchanged.

items.title: More than half dozen IPOs likely to open in June; estimated fund raising to be around Rs 8,000 crore
items.description: The IPOs of Sri Lotus Developers & Realty (Rs 800 crore), Travel Food Services (Rs 2,000 crore), Laxmi India Finance (Rs 200 crore), Indogulf Cropsciences (Rs 300 crore) and NSDL (Rs 3,000 crore) are likely to be launched in June, say market sources.

items.title: Cheers! Liquor stocks like United Spirits, Radico Khaitan can still pack a punch in FY26 after a strong Q4
items.description: Liquor stocks: Strong Q4 reinforces sector's structural uptrend, though competition from UK imports could test pricing power

items.title: Why are small, midcaps resilient despite market weakness? Here are a few clues
items.description: The resilience of the broader markets is not just technical—it’s being underpinned by improved earnings visibility, easing inflation, and a rebound in foreign inflows.

items.title: India Inc to benefit from Aatmanirbharta goal in stealth aircraft procurement
items.description: The AMCA is designed to fill a gap in India's air force, which currently lacks a fifth-generation stealth fighter. The opening up of the field for private companies should lend impetus to the programme and to indigenous capabilities

items.title: Sensex slips 200 pts, Nifty below 24,800 as FMCG, metal shares drag; mid, smallcap indices gain for 4th day
items.description: The Nifty IT and realty indices posted modest gains, while the Nifty Bank index traded nearly flat. Market volatility eased slightly since morning, with the India VIX inching up 0.27 percent to 18.59.

items.title: Buy Fineotex Chemical; target of Rs 294: Deven Choksey
items.description: Deven Choksey is bullish on Fineotex Chemical has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 294 in its research report dated May 28, 2025.

items.title: Q4 results impact: Hind Copper shares hit 5-month high as net profit jumps 50%; Triveni Engg, Techno Electric soar up to 11%
items.description: Along with the Q4 results, Hindustan Copper announced a dividend of Rs 1.46 per equity share for the financial year 2025.

items.title: Accumulate Laxmi Organic Industries; target of Rs 206: Deven Choksey
items.description: Deven Choksey recommended accumulate rating on Laxmi Organic Industries with a target price of Rs 206 in its research report dated May 28, 2025.

items.title: Is Bharat Forge stock poised for re-rating?
items.description: As export challenges persist in its core auto business, the company is strategically reallocating resources towards the defence, e-mobility, and aerospace growth engines
